dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Notice
dmca.body:
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]

Blogger DMCA Notice

Please note this is the second notice for this Blogger account.  Our first notice, sent to you on 8/9/07, did not receive a response.

1. Identify copyrighted work: The copyrighted work at issue is the text, pictures, and videos that published on our website, www.WiseBread.com.  The infringer has copied hundreds articles from WiseBread and other websites.  The list is geting longer everyday.  I am only including a sample:

The following articles are being duplicated on http://allaboutfinaceideas.blogspot.com/
1. http://www.wisebread.com/personal-financial-advisors-awaiting-your-call
2. http://www.wisebread.com/stash-your-cash-utility-trailers-as-an-extra-vehicle-alternative
3. http://www.wisebread.com/making-the-most-of-your-guilty-pleasures
4. http://www.wisebread.com/frugal-causes-mozilla-foundation
5.http://www.wisebread.com/whats-cooking-make-ahead-bread-mixes
6.http://www.wisebread.com/stock-up-on-school-an-office-supplies-with-back-to-school-sales
7.http://www.wisebread.com/friday-deal-sweet-dreams-for-a-real-bargain

The following articles are being duplicated on http://financeinfos.blogspot.com/

1. http://www.wisebread.com/a-guaranteed-way-to-avoid-impulse-credit-card-purchases
2. http://www.wisebread.com/hot-to-be-happy
3.http://www.wisebread.com/choosing-between-apples-and-oranges
4. http://www.wisebread.com/advice-to-your-younger-self-what-would-you-say
5.http://www.wisebread.com/buy-baby-bunting-but-dont-pay-full-price
6.http://www.wisebread.com/renting-is-cheaper
7.http://www.wisebread.com/10-keys-to-great-management-learned-from-an-inner-city-mission

2.  Identify infringing material.  The infringing websites are http://allaboutfinaceideas.blogspot.com/ and http://financeinfos.blogspot.com/.  They are both linked o the same Blogger account.

Again, this is only a sample.

1. http://allaboutfinanceideas.blogspot.com/2007/08/personal-financial-advisors-awaiting.html
2.http://allaboutfinanceideas.blogspot.com/2007/08/stash-your-cash-utility-trailers-as.html
3.http://allaboutfinanceideas.blogspot.com/2007/08/making-mot-of-your-guilty-pleasures.html
4.http://allaboutfinanceideas.blogspot.com/2007/08/frugal-causes-mozilla-foundation.html
5.http://allaboutfinanceideas.blogspot.com/2007/08/what-cooking-make-ahead-bread-mixes_07
6.http://allaboutfinanceideas.blogspot.com/2007/08/stock-up-on-school-and-office-supplies_09
7.http://allaboutfinanceideas.blogspot.com/2007/09/friday-deal-sweet-dreams-for-real.html

1.http://financeinfos.blogspot.com/2007/09/guaranteed-way-to-avoid-impulse-credit_07.html
2.http://financeinfos.blogspot.com/2007/09/how-to-be-happy_07.html
3.http://financeinfos.blogspot.com/2007/09/choosing-between-apples-and-oranges.html
4.http://financeinfos.blogspot.com/2007/09/advice-to-your-younger-self-what-would_07.html
5.http://financeinfos.blogspot.com/2007/09/buy-baby-bunting-but-don-pay-full-price.html
6.http://financeinfos.blogspot.com/2007/09/renting-is-cheaper_3054.html
7.http://financeinfos.blogspot.com/2007/09/10-keys-to-great-management-learned.html

3. Contact information:
[private]
[private]@killeraces.com
4. Contact information of the infringing party: unknown.

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.  I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

[private]
9/8/07
